title: ra ra dasarata
sahitya:
rArA dasharatha rAjakumArA raghuvIra dhIra

anupallavi

 mArajanaka maNImaya manjIra sundarAkAra

caraNam 1

 agaNita lOkAdhArA Ashrita jana mandAra 
khagarAja gamanuDavai karuNimpanati vEga
 
caraNam 2

 shiramuna bhAsura makuTamu uramuna maNimaya hAramu 
karamuna shara cApambulu merayaka nAyeduTa nipuDE
 
caraNam 3

 bhAmA maNIyau sItA bhAmA samEtuDavai 
rAmacandrapuri niveDali rAmadAsuni brOva
